alert.note: Alert for Colfax; Cuming; Dodge; Platte; Stanton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 6:59AM CDT until July 17 at 7:30AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Cuming County in northeastern Nebraska... Northern Colfax County in northeastern Nebraska... Northeastern Platte County in northeastern Nebraska... Northwestern Dodge County in east central Nebraska... Southeastern Stanton County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 730 AM CDT. * At 658 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Leigh, or 18 miles north of Columbus, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Clarkson around 710 AM CDT. Howells around 715 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Dodge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
